headline: How we built rate limiting capable of scaling to millions of domains
keywords: Attacks, Rate Limiting, Optimization, Network, Security, Reliability
description: Back in April we announced Rate Limiting of requests for every Cloudflare customer. Being able to rate limit at the edge of the network has many advantages: itâ€™s easier for customers to set up and operate, their origin servers are not bothered by excessive traffic or layer 7 attacks.
